conbody.p: The template descriptor allows you to specify the HTML Layout Pages using the html-page-templates element:
conbody.codeblock: <publishing-template> ... <webhelp> ... <!-- HTML page templates --> <html-page-templates> <page-template page="main" file="page-templates/wt_index.html"/> <page-template page="search" file="page-templates/wt_search.html"/> <page-template page="topic" file="page-templates/wt_topic.html"/> <page-template page="index-terms" file="page-templates/wt_terms.html"/> </html-page-templates>
conbody.note: The HTML Layout Pages are not required to be specified in an . In this case, the files from the /oxygen-webhelp/page-templates folder will be used.

If you want to specify the HTML page templates in a publishing template it is necessarily to specify all of them: topic, search, main page and index terms. In other words, you are not allowed to specify only a single HTML page template.
